sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Username , 

You are assigned with a job according to your profile.

Job Information is given below :

 

                        JOB PROFILE  :                                     Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Select Work Type

                       SERVICE REQUESTER NAME  :             Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Username

                       REQUESTER CONTACT NUMBER :      Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Sr_contact

                       EXPECTED DOJ :                                   Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛sr_doj

                       REQUESTER EMAIL :                              Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Sr_email

                       LOCATION :                                           Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Sr_address

 

For accepting the above service request please click on the link below : 

x_565960_helping_h_Feedback.do

 

Thank & Regards,

Helping Hands

Hello Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Username , 

You are assigned with a job according to your profile.

Job Information is given below :

 

                        JOB PROFILE  :                                     Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Select Work Type

                       SERVICE REQUESTER NAME  :             Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Username

                       REQUESTER CONTACT NUMBER :      Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛Sr_contact

                       EXPECTED DOJ :                                   Trigger➛Job Seeker Record➛sr_doj
